Name: Lost in Terra Mora
About the game: You will take on the role of one of the journalists following the trail of Michael's recently disappeared colleague, who was investigating the mystery of the recently discovered laboratories of the Second World War. John and Jane, brother and sister, who go in search of their colleague in the distant forests of Europe, there is clearly something wrong. Will they be able to unravel the secret hidden somewhere in the depths of the forest? Challenge mysteries beyond comprehension. Explore the secrets of a hidden world in full immersion. Traps and spooky music will keep you busy. Main storyline with multiple endings depending on your decisions. Deep well-developed lore that will interest anyone. Two main characters to choose from - John, a physically developed young man, or Jane, a young and capable journalist. Each of them has its own unique characteristics.
